name: Project Manager | Notion
description: This template was designed to keep you organized and on top of your projects. With the ability to easily organize projects and add tasks, you can keep an overview of your projects at all times. Stay organized with the task calendar and never miss a deadline again. Get a clear task overview for today and this week to stay on top of your workload and achieve your goals. Simplify your workflow and increase your productivity with this powerful task manager.
